ValidationRule.description: Required fields when Status is Complete: Prospect Name, Prospect Company
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Completed'), RecordTypeId = "0124w000001Yvxv", OR( ISBLANK(Prospect_Name__c), ISBLANK(Prospect_Company__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Prospect Name and Prospect Company are required before marking Status Complete
